description: This file contains miscellaneous utility helper functions for the client application, including debounce, classNames, formatDateTime, and formatRelativeTime.

methods.name: export function debounce<TArgs extends unknown[]>( debounce
methods.description: Creates a debounced version of a function that delays invoking until after wait milliseconds have elapsed since the last time it was invoked.

methods.name: export function classNames(...parts: Array<string | false | null | undefined>): string { classNames
methods.description: Joins multiple class name strings, filtering out falsy values, into a single string.

methods.name: export function formatDateTime(input: string | number | Date): string { formatDateTime
methods.description: Formats a date/time input into a concise, human-readable string, using Intl for localization if available.

methods.name: export function formatRelativeTime(from: string | number | Date, to: string | number | Date = Da/ formatRelativeTime
methods.description: Formats a timestamp into a relative time string, such as '5m ago'.

ctags.name: Date
ctags.pattern: /^  const d = input instanceof Date ? input : new Date(input);$/

ctags.pattern: /^  const start = from instanceof Date ? from.getTime() : new Date(from).getTime();$/
